keyword_s: How and until which proportion s the use of electronic tools and digital interfaces affects the practices of the language and the mass communication? From the writing of a text or a tweet to the post of a message on an online discussion space
It indeed takes place a whole set of rites which
Are not less the vector of neowritten forms that support the idea of a true cyberlanguage involved in the  increased writing
According to a time-honored expression Basing ourselves on some reference studies about the evolution of language practices in general
And on news commentary posted by Internet users in the spaces of online discussion
